name: CamtellsVoiceControlSkills
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Camtells Voice Control Skills, the user can control the doorbells, PTZ camera, cube camera, bullet camera by voice, and ensure that the device accurately identifies user instructions.
 
After connecting Alexa to your Camtells Smart products in a few simple steps:

(1). Download our"Camtells"app in android or ios app market

(2) Register one Camtells account in our "Camtells"app

(3). You need to have some Camtells smart devices in hand. Such as doorbells, PTZ camera, cube camera, bullet camera

(4). Configure these devices in our"Camtells app and change appropriate name for your devices which wilt be used in "Camtells Voice Control Skills" 

(5). Download Amazon"Alexa "app from android, is or Amazon app market

(6). Configure Echo with"Alexa"app

(7). Search"Camtells Voice Control Skills" from the"Alexa app skills" category

(8). Click Enable skill of "Camtells Voice Control Skills, and you'll be navigated to Camtells login page

(9). Input your Camtells account username and password, you' ll be redirect to the success paqe 

(10). Now all setup is finished
